articles.author: Federica Di Sario
articles.title: Netanyahu blames security agencies for intelligence failure, then pulls back - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Israeli prime minister retracts a post on social media blaming security agencies for allowing Hamas attack.
articles.content: A social media post by Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu lashing out at military and security chiefs for allowing a deadly Hamas attack on October 7 was promptly deleted on Sunday after trigg… [+1743 chars]
